CustomField.description: Indicates whether communique could be a reply to another Retail LIVE. This is based on the subject containing email reply/forwarding attributes (eg. Fwd, Re ..etc)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether communique could be a reply to another Retail LIVE. This is based on the subject containing email reply/forwarding attributes (eg. Fwd, Re ..etc)
CustomField.label: Possible Reply
